replies.body: I think for some of this stuff we just have to be patient. The staff team is doing a lot. For instance, they're adding new avicade games as Para said.. I've heard about a major update... and as for 1.8, I think we just need to chill, it'll happen as soon as it can, but for now don't pressure the staff, they've got a lot on their hands and don't need any more...

replies.body: For what is the survey and why do you need the results?
replies.body_tagged: For what is the survey and why do you need the results?

replies.body: This is just for information - most players get shot down if they say anything like " the server is laggy" or "Avicus needs players", this is a chance for players to say what they think without a team of mods and wantabe mods trying to degrade them by saying their post is spam and not needed. OR a chance for people to say they like the server.

OR a chance for people to say they like the server.
